leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-晶体/结构生成与逆向设计生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 生成→筛选→验证→多目标优化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 生成模型 + 筛选器 + 工作流

queries: [WEB] crystal structure generation diffusion model github
[WEB] materials inverse design generative ai github
[WEB] deep learning for crystal generation github
[WEB] generative flow networks for materials github

tools.name: Apo2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecule generation via dynamic pocket-aware diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: Apo2Mol is a generative model designed to generate 3D molecules within protein pockets. It utilizes a dynamic pocket-aware diffusion process to ensure the generated molecules fit geometrically and chemically within the target binding sites, facilitating structure-based drug design.

tools.name: DiffAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant graph diffusion model alignment implementation
tools.detailed_description: DiffAlign provides the official implementation for 'Equivariant Denoisers Cannot Copy Graphs', focusing on aligning graph diffusion models. It addresses issues in graph generation where equivariant denoisers struggle to copy graphs, offering a solution for better graph generative modeling.

tools.name: TPMS-Designer
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for generating and analyzing TPMS-like structures
tools.detailed_description: TPMS-Designer is an application to assist with the generation, analysis, and visualization of Triply Periodic Minimal Surfaces (TPMS) and other 3D objects. It is useful for designing porous structures for materials science and additive manufacturing.

tools.name: Guacamol
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: Guacamol is a standard benchmarking framework for generative chemistry models. It provides a suite of tasks to evaluate the performance of models in generating valid, novel, and optimized molecular structures, serving as a baseline for the field.

tools.name: AEM_DIM_Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for artificial electromagnetic material inverse design
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides benchmarks and inverse deep learning methods for designing artificial electromagnetic materials. It facilitates the evaluation of models aimed at predicting material structures from electromagnetic properties.

tools.name: MM_Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for meta-material inverse design solvers
tools.detailed_description: MM_Bench offers a collection of benchmarking problems for meta-material inverse design using deep learning solvers. It aims to standardize the evaluation of inverse design algorithms in the field of metamaterials.

tools.name: idlm_Ben
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse mapping solver for meta-material design
tools.detailed_description: This project implements deep learning methods for the inverse mapping problem in meta-material design, allowing researchers to generate material structures that satisfy specific property constraints.

tools.name: MultimodalCPF
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based multimodal framework for crystal property prediction
tools.detailed_description: MultimodalCPF is a framework that fuses crystal structure and text data to predict material properties. It uses a transformer-based architecture with modality-aware training to enhance prediction accuracy and interpretability.

tools.name: bio-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Bio-diffusion implements a Geometry-Complete Diffusion Model (GCDM) for generating and optimizing 3D molecular structures. It is designed to handle the complex geometric constraints of biomolecules for drug discovery applications.

tools.name: Artisan-Core
tools.one_line_profile: Computational tool for lattice structure generation
tools.detailed_description: Artisan-Core is a computational library designed for the generation of complex lattice structures. It supports the design of metamaterials and lightweight structures for additive manufacturing.

tools.name: 3D-MCTS
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based molecule generation using Monte Carlo Tree Search
tools.detailed_description: 3D-MCTS is a general method for generating molecules based on 3D structural constraints. It combines Monte Carlo Tree Search with generative models to explore chemical space effectively.

tools.name: EGADO
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-guided optimization for silicon photonic device inverse design
tools.detailed_description: EGADO implements an edge-guided analog-and-digital optimization algorithm for the inverse design of silicon photonic devices. It is specifically tailored for designing high-capacity multi-dimensional optical interconnects.

tools.name: MolRL
tools.one_line_profile: Targeted molecular generation with latent reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: MolRL is a tool for generating molecules with specific target properties using latent reinforcement learning. It optimizes molecular structures in a latent space to satisfy desired chemical constraints.

tools.name: EDM
tools.one_line_profile: E(3) Equivariant Diffusion Model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: EDM implements an E(3) equivariant diffusion model for generating 3D molecular structures. It ensures that the generated molecules respect rotational and translational symmetries, which is crucial for physical validity.

tools.name: MHC-Diff
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant diffusion model for peptide-MHC structure generation
tools.detailed_description: MHC-Diff is a specialized equivariant diffusion model designed to generate 3D structures of peptide-MHC complexes, aiding in the understanding of immune responses and vaccine design.

tools.name: EcConf
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast equivariant consistency model for molecular conformation
tools.detailed_description: EcConf is a diffusion-based model for generating molecular conformations with high speed and equivariant consistency. It addresses the computational cost of traditional conformation generation methods.

tools.name: EquiCSP
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant diffusion model for crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: EquiCSP applies equivariant diffusion models to the problem of Crystal Structure Prediction (CSP). It generates periodic crystal structures that respect the necessary symmetries and geometric constraints.

tools.name: MolSpectLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model bridging spectroscopy and molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: MolSpectLLM is a molecular foundation model that integrates spectroscopy data with molecule elucidation and 3D structure generation. It enables the generation of molecular structures directly from spectral data.

tools.name: OMatG
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for inorganic crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: OMatG is a generative model designed for the de novo generation and prediction of inorganic crystal structures. It aims to discover stable crystal materials by learning from existing crystallographic data.

tools.name: PROPTI
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse problem solver for material parameter estimation
tools.detailed_description: PROPTI is a tool that couples simulation models with optimization algorithms to solve inverse problems, specifically for estimating material parameters from experimental data (e.g., in fire dynamics).

tools.name: deCIFer
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure prediction from powder X-ray diffraction data
tools.detailed_description: deCIFer is a transformer-based model that predicts crystal structures by generating Crystallographic Information Files (CIFs) directly from powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) patterns.

tools.name: GFlowNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Flow Networks library for probabilistic modeling
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the reference implementation of Generative Flow Networks (GFlowNets), a probabilistic framework often used for generating discrete objects like molecular graphs in scientific discovery.

tools.name: Inverse Molecular Design
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous generator of organic compounds from target properties
tools.detailed_description: This tool serves as an autonomous generator for novel organic compounds, designing molecules that meet specific physicochemical property targets to accelerate materials and drug discovery.

tools.name: JODO
tools.one_line_profile: Joint 2D & 3D diffusion models for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: JODO implements a framework for learning joint 2D and 3D diffusion models, enabling the generation of complete molecular representations that include both graph topology and 3D geometry.

tools.name: MolFM
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant flow matching for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: MolFM implements Equivariant Flow Matching with Hybrid Probability Transport, a method for generating 3D molecular structures that offers advantages over standard diffusion models in terms of sampling efficiency.

tools.name: ED-HNN
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Hypergraph Diffusion Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: ED-HNN implements Equivariant Hypergraph Diffusion Neural Operators, a method for learning on hypergraphs with equivariance properties, applicable to complex scientific data structures.

tools.name: 2D-equivariant-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: 2D structure generation using equivariant diffusion
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides a generative diffusion model composed of rotationally equivariant Graph Convolutional Layers, designed for generating 2D structures.

tools.name: ProteinReDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant diffusion model for ligand-binding protein redesign
tools.detailed_description: ProteinReDiff is a complex-based generative model using equivariant diffusion to redesign ligand-binding proteins, facilitating the engineering of proteins with specific binding properties.

tools.name: CVAE for Concrete Design
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for sustainable concrete material design
tools.detailed_description: This tool uses a Conditional Variational Autoencoder (CVAE) to design environment-friendly concrete mixtures. It predicts compressive strength and environmental impact, aiding in sustainable building material discovery.

tools.name: Paraffin-EG-Model
tools.one_line_profile: Thermal conductivity prediction for paraffin composites
tools.detailed_description: This tool generates paraffin expanded graphite composite structures using the QSGS method and predicts their thermal conductivity using a CNN trained on Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) simulation data.

tools.name: GeoDiffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: GeoDiffusion is a PyTorch implementation of a geometric diffusion model designed for generating 3D molecular conformations and structures, leveraging geometric deep learning principles.

tools.name: UnityMol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization and analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: UnityMol is a molecular viewer and analysis tool built on the Unity game engine. It provides high-quality visualization of molecular structures, surfaces, and interactions for structural biology and chemistry.

tools.name: GFMDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric-facilitated denoising diffusion for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: GFMDiff is a diffusion-based generative model that incorporates geometric information to facilitate the generation of valid and high-quality 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: Uni-Mol3
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: Uni-Mol3 is a PyTorch implementation of a molecular representation learning framework. It is designed to learn robust representations of molecules for various downstream tasks, including property prediction and generation.

tools.name: SPINNER
tools.one_line_profile: Inorganic crystal structure prediction with neural potentials
tools.detailed_description: SPINNER is a tool for predicting the structures of inorganic crystals. It combines neural network potentials with evolutionary and random search algorithms to efficiently explore the crystal configuration space.

tools.name: HTOCSP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated high-throughput organic crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: HTOCSP is a framework designed for the automated, high-throughput prediction of organic crystal structures. It streamlines the process of generating and evaluating potential crystal packings for organic molecules.

tools.name: PyXtal
tools.one_line_profile: Generation of atomic structures with symmetry
tools.detailed_description: PyXtal is a Python library for generating atomic structures with specific symmetry constraints. It supports the generation of crystals, molecules, and clusters, making it a fundamental tool for structure prediction and materials modeling.

tools.name: PyXtal_FF
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning interatomic potential predictions
tools.detailed_description: PyXtal_FF is a package for developing and using machine learning interatomic potentials. It enables the simulation of material properties and dynamics with accuracy comparable to ab initio methods but at a lower computational cost.

tools.name: ml_conformer_generator
tools.one_line_profile: Shape-constrained molecule generation via equivariant diffusion
tools.detailed_description: This tool generates molecular conformers that satisfy specific shape constraints using a combination of Equivariant Diffusion models and Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN).

tools.name: db-sync
tools.one_line_profile: Synchronization tool for Mergin Maps and PostGIS
tools.detailed_description: db-sync enables two-way synchronization between Mergin Maps (a field data collection tool) and PostGIS databases. It is essential for managing and integrating geospatial data collected in scientific field surveys.

tools.name: geodiff
tools.one_line_profile: Library for handling diffs of geospatial data
tools.detailed_description: geodiff is a library designed to handle differences and changes in geospatial data formats. It supports the version control and management of complex scientific geospatial datasets.

tools.name: GeoDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric diffusion model for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of GeoDiff, a geometric diffusion model designed for generating 3D molecular conformations. It treats the conformation generation as a reverse diffusion process, ensuring rotational and translational invariance.

tools.name: GeoLDM
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric latent diffusion models for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Geometric Latent Diffusion Models (GeoLDM) for generating 3D molecules. It operates in a latent space to capture geometric features and generate valid molecular structures.

tools.name: SHAARP
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of optical second harmonic generation from crystal surfaces
tools.detailed_description: An open-source package for deriving and simulating optical second harmonic generation (SHG) response from a single crystal surface. It handles arbitrary symmetry, orientation, and complex refractive indices.

tools.name: WyckoffTransformer
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for symmetric crystals using Wyckoff positions
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model for generating symmetric crystal structures. It leverages Wyckoff positions to ensure crystallographic symmetry in the generated structures.

tools.name: CrySPY
tools.one_line_profile: Automated crystal structure prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A crystal structure prediction tool that automates the search for stable crystal structures using various algorithms (random search, evolutionary algorithms, Bayesian optimization) coupled with ab initio calculations.

tools.name: xtalmet
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics and distance functions for crystal generation evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing distance functions and evaluation metrics specifically designed for assessing the quality and diversity of generated crystal structures.

tools.name: IRDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Interaction-based retrieval-augmented diffusion for protein-specific molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion model framework that uses interaction-based retrieval augmentation to generate 3D molecules tailored to specific protein targets.

tools.name: IM2ODE
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design of materials via multi-objective differential evolution
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for the inverse design of materials using multi-objective differential evolution algorithms to optimize material properties.

tools.name: abipy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analyzing ABINIT results
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing the results produced by ABINIT, an open-source package for the simulation of the electronic structure of systems.

tools.name: NExT-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecule generation combining diffusion and language modeling
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of NExT-Mol, a framework that integrates 3D diffusion models with 1D language modeling for generating 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: GFlowNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Flow Networks library
tools.detailed_description: A library for Generative Flow Networks (GFlowNets), a class of generative models often applied in scientific discovery for sampling diverse candidates (e.g., molecules, crystals) proportional to a reward function.

tools.name: MiAD
tools.one_line_profile: Mirage Atom Diffusion for de novo crystal generation
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of MiAD (Mirage Atom Diffusion), a diffusion-based model for generating crystal structures from scratch.

tools.name: CrystalGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Adversarial Networks for crystal structure discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) framework designed to learn and discover new crystallographic structures.

tools.name: Equiformer
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Graph Attention Transformer for 3D atomistic graphs
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network architecture leveraging SE(3) equivariance and attention mechanisms for modeling 3D atomistic systems, useful for property prediction and potential generation.

tools.name: EquiformerV2
tools.one_line_profile: Improved Equivariant Transformer for scaling to higher-degree representations
tools.detailed_description: The second version of Equiformer, offering improved performance and scalability for equivariant graph representation learning on 3D atomistic data.

tools.name: icsg3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D inorganic crystal structure generation and property prediction via representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating 3D inorganic crystal structures and predicting their properties using representation learning techniques, as presented in JCIM 2020.

tools.name: MatSci-LLM-Agents
tools.one_line_profile: Agentic framework for materials science combining LLMs with domain tools
tools.detailed_description: An agent-based framework that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) with specific materials science tools to automate tasks such as property extraction, simulation execution, and crystal structure generation.

tools.name: ORGANIC
tools.one_line_profile: Objective-Reinforced Generative Adversarial Networks for Inverse-design Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Objective-Reinforced Generative Adversarial Networks (ORGAN) specifically tailored for the inverse design of chemical structures and materials.

tools.name: MiDi
tools.one_line_profile: Mixed Graph and 3D Denoising Diffusion for Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model that jointly generates molecular graphs and their corresponding 3D conformers, utilizing equivariant neural networks.

tools.name: Con-CDVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Conditionally generative model for crystal structures based on CDVAE
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of the Crystal Diffusion Variational Autoencoder (CDVAE) designed for conditional generation of crystal structures based on specific requirements.

tools.name: Pocket2Mol_RL
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-tuning Pocket-conditioned 3D Molecule Generation via Reinforcement Learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework for generating 3D molecules conditioned on protein pockets, utilizing reinforcement learning to fine-tune the generation process for better binding affinity and structural validity.

tools.name: CrystalFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Space Group Informed Transformer for Crystalline Materials Generation
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based generative model that incorporates space group constraints to generate valid and stable crystalline material structures.

tools.name: Uni-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Universal 3D Molecular Representation Learning Framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for 3D molecular representation learning, supporting tasks like molecular property prediction, conformation generation, and pre-training on large-scale datasets.

tools.name: DM2
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion models for disordered materials generation
tools.detailed_description: A specialized diffusion model implementation designed for generating structures of disordered materials, addressing the unique challenges in modeling non-crystalline systems.

tools.name: DeepCrystal
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Framework for sequence-based Protein Crystallization Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting the propensity of proteins to crystallize based on their sequence information, aiding in the experimental design of crystallography.

tools.name: RL_materials_generation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Inverse Inorganic Materials Design
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for inverse design of inorganic materials using deep reinforcement learning techniques to optimize material properties.

tools.name: FlowMM
tools.one_line_profile: Riemannian Flow Matching for Material Generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Flow Matching models for generating materials, including FlowMM and FlowLLM, which utilize Riemannian geometry and Large Language Models as base distributions.

tools.name: Equivariant Neural Diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Neural Diffusion for Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model that respects E(3) equivariance for generating 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: OM-Diff
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse-design of organometallic catalysts with guided equivariant denoising diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A guided equivariant denoising diffusion model specifically designed for the inverse design of organometallic catalysts.

tools.name: cdvae_xrd
tools.one_line_profile: Deep PXRD Crystallography with CDVAE
tools.detailed_description: An extension of CDVAE applied to Powder X-Ray Diffraction (PXRD) crystallography, enabling structure generation or refinement based on diffraction data.

tools.name: Deep Crystallography
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Electron Density Field Generation for Powder Crystallography
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for generating electron density fields directly from powder crystallography data, facilitating structure determination.

tools.name: CNN-based-Inverse-Design
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design of soft materials via deep-learning-based evolutionary strategy
tools.detailed_description: Code for the inverse design of soft materials using a combination of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and evolutionary strategies.

tools.name: MatFuse
tools.one_line_profile: Controllable Material Generation with Diffusion Models
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based framework for controllable generation of materials, allowing for multi-modal conditioning and property-guided synthesis.

tools.name: Active-Generative-Design
tools.one_line_profile: Active generative design of wide bandgap materials
tools.detailed_description: Source code for an active learning framework applied to the generative design of wide bandgap materials, optimizing for specific electronic properties.

tools.name: generative-optim
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective optimization in latent space of generative chemistry models
tools.detailed_description: Tools for performing multi- and many-objective optimization within the latent space of generative models for chemistry, aiming to discover molecules with optimal trade-offs.

tools.name: LinkerNet
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment Poses and Linker Co-Design with 3D Equivariant Diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A 3D equivariant diffusion model for the simultaneous design of molecular linkers and fragment poses, useful in fragment-based drug discovery.

tools.name: TargetDiff
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Equivariant Diffusion for Target-Aware Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: A target-aware molecule generation model using 3D equivariant diffusion, designed to generate molecules with high affinity to specific protein targets.

tools.name: Robocrystallographer
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of crystal structure descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates human-readable text descriptions of crystal structures from standard structure files (e.g., CIF), facilitating analysis and reporting.

tools.name: DomainAdaptation-CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Domain adaptation-based Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of CGCNN enhanced with domain adaptation techniques to improve predictions of experimental band gaps from crystal lattice data.

tools.name: Chemeleon
tools.one_line_profile: Text-guided diffusion model for crystal structure generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that uses text descriptions to guide the diffusion-based generation of crystal structures, enabling language-conditioned materials design.

tools.name: Chemeleon-DNG
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion models for material generation
tools.detailed_description: Supplementary or related implementation of diffusion models for material generation, associated with the Chemeleon project.

tools.name: Chemeleon2
tools.one_line_profile: RL framework for Crystal Structure Generation using GRPO
tools.detailed_description: An advanced framework utilizing Reinforcement Learning (specifically GRPO) for optimizing crystal structure generation.

tools.name: DiffLinker
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant 3D-Conditional Diffusion Model for Molecular Linker Design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model for designing molecular linkers connecting molecular fragments, using equivariant 3D-conditional diffusion.

tools.name: MatAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Generative framework for interpretable and targeted inorganic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining diffusion-based generation, property prediction, and LLM-driven reasoning for targeted design of inorganic materials.

tools.name: DiffCSP
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Structure Prediction by Joint Equivariant Diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based model for crystal structure prediction that jointly generates lattice parameters and atomic coordinates while respecting equivariance.

tools.name: DiffCSP-PP
tools.one_line_profile: Space Group Constrained Crystal Generation
tools.detailed_description: An enhanced version of DiffCSP that incorporates space group constraints to generate physically valid crystal structures.

tools.name: MatDesINNe
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse materials design via invertible neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for inverse materials design utilizing Invertible Neural Networks (INNs) to map properties back to structures/compositions.

tools.name: imatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Image-based generative model for inverse design of solid state materials
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that leverages image-based representations for the inverse design of solid-state materials.

tools.name: TGDMat
tools.one_line_profile: Periodic Materials Generation using Text-Guided Joint Diffusion Model
tools.detailed_description: A text-guided joint diffusion model for generating periodic material structures, enabling design based on natural language descriptions.

tools.name: SQUID
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Shape-Conditioned Generation of 3D Molecules
tools.detailed_description: A generative model for creating 3D molecules conditioned on specific shapes, utilizing equivariant networks for ligand-based drug design.

tools.name: HierarchicalDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Computational building block approach for multiscale architected materials
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework for the analysis and design of multiscale architected materials, specifically hierarchical metal metamaterials.

tools.name: CrystaLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Model for crystal structure generation using CIF format
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that treats crystal structure generation as a language modeling task, generating CIF (Crystallographic Information File) contents to create valid crystal structures.

tools.name: ChemDASH
tools.one_line_profile: Chemically Directed Atom Swap Hopping for crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for crystal structure prediction that optimizes structures by swapping atoms in unfavourable chemical environments, developed by the Leverhulme Research Centre.

tools.name: FUSE
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure prediction code using evolutionary algorithms
tools.detailed_description: The stable release of FUSE, a code for predicting crystal structures, maintained by the Leverhulme Research Centre for Functional Materials Design.

tools.name: ipcsp
tools.one_line_profile: Integer Programming encoding for Crystal Structure Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool that formulates crystal structure prediction as an integer programming problem, featuring bindings for both classic and quantum computing solvers.

tools.name: ddpm-ipa-protein-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure generation using DDPM and Invariant Point Attention
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM) combined with Invariant Point Attention (IPA) for generating protein structures and sequences.

tools.name: equiformer-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Equiformer-based diffusion model for protein design
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion model implementation for protein design that leverages Equiformer (SE3/E3 equivariant attention) for improved structural generation.

tools.name: equiformer-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: SE3/E3 equivariant attention network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Equiformer, an SE3/E3 equivariant transformer architecture used as a backbone for various molecular and protein generation tasks.

tools.name: LatticeWorks
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for functionally graded lattice generation
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for generating functionally graded lattice structures in various configurations, useful for mechanical engineering and materials design.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations using VASP, built upon the Materials Project infrastructure.

tools.name: dZiner
tools.one_line_profile: AI Agent for rational inverse design of materials
tools.detailed_description: A chemist AI agent framework designed for the rational inverse design of materials, leveraging generative models to propose structures meeting specific criteria.

tools.name: MOFDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-grained diffusion model for Metal-Organic Framework design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model using coarse-grained diffusion for the design of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs), enabling the generation of novel porous materials.

tools.name: MatterGen
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for inorganic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for inorganic materials design that can generate crystal structures across the periodic table, fine-tunable for specific property constraints.

tools.name: GNNOpt
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for prediction of optical spectra from crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: A Universal Ensemble-Embedding Graph Neural Network designed for the direct prediction of optical spectra from crystal structures.

tools.name: MolDiff
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecule generation using diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model for 3D molecule generation that addresses atom-bond inconsistency problems.

tools.name: equivariant-deep-dmri
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant networks for diffusion MRI analysis
tools.detailed_description: Rotationally and translationally equivariant layers and networks designed for deep learning analysis of diffusion MRI scans.

tools.name: Equivariant Diffusion Policy
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant diffusion models for robotic policy learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Equivariant Diffusion Policy, applying diffusion models with SE(3) equivariance for robotic manipulation tasks.

tools.name: FuncMol
tools.one_line_profile: Score-based 3D molecule generation with neural fields
tools.detailed_description: A framework for 3D molecule generation using score-based generative models and neural fields, developed by Prescient Design.

tools.name: QuantumMolGAN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Generative Adversarial Networks for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: Source code exploring the advantages of Quantum Generative Adversarial Networks (QGANs) for generative chemistry applications.

tools.name: HierDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-to-Fine Hierarchical Diffusion Model for Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a hierarchical diffusion model that generates 3D molecules in a coarse-to-fine manner.

tools.name: QuantumMASALA
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Materials Ab initio Electronic-structure Package
tools.detailed_description: An ab initio electronic structure package for quantum materials, developed by the Quantum Technology Initiative at IISc.

tools.name: PyXtal_ml
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning library for materials property modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for modeling materials properties using machine learning, part of the PyXtal ecosystem.

tools.name: MatInvent
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse materials design using generative diffusion models and reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: MatInvent is a platform for accelerating inverse materials design. It leverages generative diffusion models combined with reinforcement learning to discover new materials with optimized properties.

tools.name: GOSC Graph State Generation
tools.one_line_profile: Compiler for generating graph states for surface code quantum computing
tools.detailed_description: A tool for building and generating graph states based on lattice surgery for large-scale quantum computing, specifically for surface codes.

tools.name: MT-CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask Learning integrated with Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network (CGCNN) that utilizes multitask learning to predict material properties more effectively.

tools.name: Matbench Genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking metrics for generative materials models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing standardized metrics for benchmarking generative materials models, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE evaluation protocols.

tools.name: CSLLM
tools.one_line_profile: LLM system for predicting crystal structure synthesizability and precursors
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model based system designed to predict the synthesizability of crystal structures and identify potential precursors with high accuracy.

tools.name: UnifiedMolPretrain
tools.one_line_profile: Unified 2D and 3D pre-training framework for molecular representations
tools.detailed_description: A framework for pre-training molecular representations that integrates both 2D and 3D molecular data to improve downstream task performance.

tools.name: Diffusion-EDFs
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-equivariant denoising generative modeling on SE(3) for robotic manipulation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Diffusion Equivariant Descriptor Fields (EDFs) for visual robotic manipulation, utilizing SE(3)-equivariant denoising generative models.

tools.name: DP-CDVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Probabilistic Crystal Diffusion Variational Autoencoder
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion probabilistic model based on CDVAE for generating crystal structures, enhancing the generation capabilities for periodic materials.

tools.name: CDVAE
tools.one_line_profile: SE(3)-invariant autoencoder for generating periodic material structures
tools.detailed_description: Crystal Diffusion Variational Autoencoder (CDVAE) is a generative model for creating periodic crystal structures, ensuring SE(3) invariance and capturing structural periodicity.

tools.name: CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks for material property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework using graph convolutional neural networks to predict material properties directly from the crystal graph structure.

tools.name: CDVAE-VC
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of CDVAE-VC for crystal generation
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of the CDVAE-VC model, focusing on variational crystal generation.

tools.name: AlphaCrystal
tools.one_line_profile: Contact map based deep learning algorithm for crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that uses contact maps to predict crystal structures, developed by the University of South Carolina.

tools.name: CSPBenchMetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark metrics for crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of metrics designed to benchmark and evaluate the performance of crystal structure prediction algorithms.

tools.name: TLOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design tool for composite metal oxide optical materials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the inverse design of composite metal oxide materials specifically optimized for optical properties.

tools.name: CSPBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for crystal structure prediction algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite to evaluate and compare different algorithms used for crystal structure prediction.

tools.name: InvDesFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design framework for high-temperature superconducting materials
tools.detailed_description: InvDesFlow integrates generative models, stability models, and property prediction models for the inverse design of high-temperature superconductors.

tools.name: InvDesFlow-AL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning-based generative framework for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: An extension of InvDesFlow that incorporates active learning to iteratively optimize material generation towards desired properties.

tools.name: EquiBot
tools.one_line_profile: SIM(3)-Equivariant Diffusion Policy for generalizable robotic learning
tools.detailed_description: EquiBot implements a SIM(3)-equivariant diffusion policy to enable data-efficient and generalizable learning for robotic manipulation tasks.

tools.name: ET-SEED
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Trajectory-Level SE(3) Equivariant Diffusion Policy
tools.detailed_description: ET-SEED is an efficient trajectory-level SE(3) equivariant diffusion policy designed for robust robotic manipulation.
